A classic game that still holds up today. People thought that this game going FTP would kill the game, but the prime status and trust factor feature made it so I never encountered a hacker while playing. The graphics still look alright even to this day, and you come across many cool players. Overall I would reccomend you try the game out FTP and stay off Dust II and Inferno when playing comp since I hear that's where most of the hackers like to play when starting out.
